import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './joining.css' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import Logo from './searlogo.png' function JoiningLetter() { return (

Joining Letter

SAER TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

Date: DD-MM-YYYY
Miss/Mr/Mrs Name
Address:

Dear Name,

We take great pleasure in initiating you to be an integral part of SAER Technologies Private Limited.
Congratulations on being selected for the position of Designation at our organization. You'll be on probation for a period of 3 months, which may be further reduced or extended at the sole discretion of the organization. After completion of the probationary period, you'll be eligible for leave, as per the company rules.

We congratulate you on your appointment and wish you a long career with us. We assure you have a great journey and get our full support for your professional growth and development.

With Regards,
Yours Sincerely,
Name

Dharma Ram
Director
SAER Technologies Private Limited

P.S for any further clarifications hereafter kindly write to hr@saertechnologies.com

Registered Office: SAER TECHNOLOGIES PVT. LTD. 450, B2, Loknayak Puram, New Delhi, 110041

Office : SAER TECHNOLOGIES PVT. LTD. Shop No-52, Model Town B, Malviya Nagar, Jaipur ,302017

Ph: +91 93126 00755 Email: admin@saertechnologies.com Website: www.saertechnologies.com

CIN: U72900DL2022PTC403443

{/* */}
) } export default JoiningLetter
